header.title: Ерекшеліктер
header.subtitle: Өзіңізді ерекше таныстырыңыз
header.description: Миссияңызға ғана назар аударыңыз. Қалғанының бәрін біз реттейміз. Біздің ерекшеліктеріміздің арқасында сіздің бизнесіңіз көптің арасында ерекше көзге түседі

content.title: Reliable content
content.description: Information about educational centers and courses are reviewed by our editors. Everything will be easy for customers to understand

marketing.title.title: We'll handle marketing for you
marketing.title.description: We provide you with ready clients. We will increase your popularity through our platform

requests.title: Online applications
requests.description: Your customers will be able to apply to your courses and track the status of their applications

multilanguage.title: Available in 3 languages
multilanguage.description: Platform will be available in kazakh, english and russian. All of the content will be translated and reviewed carefully

images.title: Best quality images
images.description: High quality images will be taken by professional photographers to accurately represent your center

online.title: Online 24/7
online.description: Your center will be available to your customers 24/7. No need to launch your own website
